svad:
This property verifies that the PauseTimer signal is cleared to zero one clock cycle after the RxReset signal becomes active. 

Specifically, on every positive edge of the MRxClk clock, when RxReset transitions to logic 1, the PauseTimer[15:0] signal must equal 16'h0 exactly one clock cycle later. The property is disabled and not checked when RxReset is at logic 0.
